title: Web Developer, Healthtii Inc.
description: Created collaboration feature for doctors to share ideas, increasing user engagement and retention
Redesigned website layout to improve flow and responsiveness, streamlining and improving the user experience on all devices
Built medical form scoring system that speeds up diagnosis process, detects worrying symptoms and notifies doctor of potential risk

title: Portfolio Website
description: Designed and created a portfolio website with React Hooks and Firebase to highlight my skills and experience
Effectively used CSS Grid and Flexbox to create a responsive design, and used animation to create a dynamic user experience
Set up web hosting, SSL certificates, and a firebase backend to create a secure easily useable site

title: Amplify
description: Built a web application designed to highlight the injustice that women face in the workplaces and in the community, winning the grand prize at the HackHERS 2021 Hackathon
Built a map where users can anonymously share their stories in realtime using Firebase realtime database, creating a heatmap of incidences of harassment
Created a system for users to users to rate employers based on their commitment to diversity and gender equality and view companies' past track records

title: StudyVille
description: Built a web application with Node.js that works as a virtual school for students to study and learn in, improving productivity in online schools
Won the grand prize of PackHacks 2021
Created a full-stack project with user authentication, video chat, and live websockets text chat using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js), and deployed to heroku

title: Virtual-Me
description: Created a web application with React and Firebase that matches a virtual avatar to a users face using facial recognition and lets them download and use the avatar in a unity application
Used Azure Cognitive Services facial recognition machine learning to match avatars in a Firebase database with a user uploaded image in order to find the ideal avatar for a user
Generated avatar could be used by users in a desktop unity application that acts as virtual camera to use in video meetings

title: StudAI
description: Created Fullstack web application that uses artifical intelligence to match students to study partners for the TOHacks 2021 Hackathon
Used machine learning agglomerative clustering algorithm written in python to create ideal matches between and other students, as well as between students and tutors
Created and deployed React frontend using Netlify, with a hybrid Python and Node.js backends hosted on Heroku, using CockroachDB SQL as a backend
